title: Clinical Practical Competency Strengthening: Creative Engineering Design Project: Problem-Solving Competency Through Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific principles, recognition of simple mechanical structures, and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with team members of diverse personalities/learning styles to complete a three-stage design process (problem definition–modeling–evaluation).
Learners can independently perform the prototype development process by more than 80% using digital tools (3D modeling, collaboration platforms) in a BYOD environment.
Learners can present team project outcomes according to a PBL assessment rubric and explain technical validity (functional implementation) and social impact (problem-solving effectiveness).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
